name: Cheesy Burger Bake
ingredients: 8 ounces colby-jack cheese, diced or cubed

instructions.en: Brown ground beef with onion until onion starts to brown. Drain fat if desired.
instructions.sk: Opečte mleté mäso s cibuľou, kým cibuľa nezačne hnednúť. Podľa potreby zlejte tuk.
instructions.ja: 挽肉と玉ねぎを玉ねぎが少し茶色くなるまで炒めます。必要に応じて脂を切ります。

instructions.en: Season the meat mixture to taste.
instructions.ja: 肉の混ぜ物を好みの味付けにします。

instructions.en: Put meat mixture in a 6x8 inch baking dish and stir in the diced cheese.
instructions.sk: Vložte mäsovú zmes do zapekacej misy 15x20 cm a vmiešajte nakrájaný syr.
instructions.ja: 6x8インチ（約15x20cm）の焼き皿に肉の混ぜ物を入れ、角切りチーズを混ぜ込みます。

instructions.en: Bake at 350°F for 20 minutes or until cheese is melted and bubbly.
instructions.sk: Pečte pri 175°C 20 minút alebo kým sa syr neroztopí a nezačne bublať.
instructions.ja: 350°F（175°C）のオーブンで20分間、またはチーズが溶けて泡立つまで焼きます。

notes: Makes about 4 servings. Suggested seasonings include a combination of taco seasoning and Nacho Cheddar flavor Kernel Seasons, but any preferred seasonings can be used.
